Class w3c.thotlib.ElementType 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----w3c.thotlib.ElementType
public class ElementType
extends Object
Java Classe associated to a ElementType.

The Java class is just a wrapper around the actual Element data structure handled in the native code.

ElementType()
Dumb initialization, don't use it unless you know the internals.
ElementType(Document, int)
Create a new ElementType object based on the type number
ElementType(Element)
Create a new ElementType object based on an existing Element.
ElementType(int)
Create an incomplete new ElementType object.
ElementType(int, int)
Create a new ElementType object based on the type number
ElementType(long, int)
Create a new ElementType object.
ElementType(String)
Create a new ElementType object based on a type name.

GetType()
Returns the internal number of the type.
Name()
Returns the external name of an Element type.
Print()
Debugging
SetSSchema(long)
Set the internal SSchema number of the type.
SetType(int)
Set the internal number of the type.
Value()
Returns the internal number of the type.

ElementType 
 public ElementType()
Dumb initialization, don't use it unless you know the internals.

ElementType 
 public ElementType(int t)
Create an incomplete new ElementType object.

Parameters:
t - the type number of the element type (w.r.t. the document SSchema)
ElementType 
 public ElementType(long s,
                    int t)
Create a new ElementType object.

Parameters:
s - the SSchema for this type
t - the type number of the element type
ElementType 
 public ElementType(Element el)
Create a new ElementType object based on an existing Element.

Parameters:
el - an Element of the given type
ElementType 
 public ElementType(String TypeName)
Create a new ElementType object based on a type name.

Parameters:
TypeName - the type name
ElementType 
 public ElementType(Document doc,
                    int value)
Create a new ElementType object based on the type number

Parameters:
doc - the Document
value - the type value (w.r.t. the document SSchema).
ElementType 
 public ElementType(int doc,
                    int value)
Create a new ElementType object based on the type number

Parameters:
doc - the document number
value - the type value (w.r.t. the document SSchema).

Name 
 public String Name()
Returns the external name of an Element type.

Returns:
the string containing the name, or null if it failed.
Value 
 public int Value()
Returns the internal number of the type.

Returns:
the int value for this type.
SetType 
 public void SetType(int value)
Set the internal number of the type.

Parameters:
value - the int value for this type.
SetSSchema 
 public void SetSSchema(long value)
Set the internal SSchema number of the type.

Parameters:
value - the int value for this SSchema type.

Returns:
the int value for this type.
